definition: foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc

sentences.english: When riled , the Druids of the Claw display ferocious power and stamina.
sentences.chinese: 当被激怒时，利爪德鲁依便展现出凶猛的力量和耐力。

sentences.english: The owls ' formidable talons can carry birds up to the size of a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰的利爪能抓起鸡那么大小的鸟儿。

sentences.english: His claws tore her pelt as he dragged her to the her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他的利爪破了她的皮毛，然后将她拖倒在地。

sentences.english: When I have a talon with a keen edge.
sentences.chinese: 当我有了一对尖锐的利爪。

sentences.english: Ten soldiers have died in Operation Panther's Claw.
sentences.chinese: 已有10名士兵在黑豹利爪行动中死亡。

sentences.english: You have taught the lion and the eagle how to hunt and prosper with teeth and claw.
sentences.chinese: 您曾经教狮子和雄鹰如何利用牙齿和利爪觅食。

sentences.english: My legs are long with sharp claws for hanging.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿长，且带有利爪，以利于悬挂。

definition: foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc
bloody mouth (from devouring freshly killed prey)
